Package controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
controller.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the main game engine which carry out commands of the players

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameEngine​(java.util.Scanner p_scannerObject, LogEntryBuffer p_logEntryBuffer, FileEntryLogger p_fileEntryLogger)
    This constructor is used to set the scanner object context

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addRemovePlayers​(java.lang.String[] p_commandList)
    Used to add/remove players
    void assignCountries()
    This function is used to assign countries to all the players as per the rules and then start the Game Engine.
    void assignReinforcements()
    This function is used to assign reinforcements to the players as per the game rules
    boolean checkWinner()
    This function checks if the game has end.
    void executeOrderLoop()
    This function is used to loop over all the players in round-robin fashion to request execute orders
    LogEntryBuffer getLogEntryBuffer()
    This function returns the LogEntryBuffer object which is used to add log entries.
    MapState getMapState()
    Get the current map state.
    Player getNeutralPlayer()
    This function returns the pointer to neutral player
    Phase getPhase()
    This functions return object of the current phase
    PlayersState getPlayersState()
    Get the current players state.
    void issueCardsAndRefreshNegotiation()
    This function is used to assign cards to all player who concurred atleast one country.
    void issueOrderLoop()
    This function is used to loop over all the players in round-robin fashion to request issue orders
    void loadGameEngine()
    This function loads the Game Engine machine that starts the game and initializes the main game loop.
    void loadGameEngineConsole()
    Used to load the GameEngine console for game play phase
    void removeLostPlayers()
    This function is used to remove all players from the game who doesn't own a country.
    void setNeutralPlayer()
    This functions is used to initialize neutral player
    void setPhase​(int p_phase)
    This function is used to set the phase based on integer value.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEngine

      public GameEngine​(java.util.Scanner p_scannerObject, LogEntryBuffer p_logEntryBuffer, FileEntryLogger p_fileEntryLogger)
      This constructor is used to set the scanner object context
      Parameters:
      p_scannerObject - The context of scanner object
      p_logEntryBuffer - The context of concrete Observer class
      p_fileEntryLogger - The context of concrete Observable class

  • Method Details

    • setNeutralPlayer

      public void setNeutralPlayer()
      This functions is used to initialize neutral player

    • getLogEntryBuffer

      public LogEntryBuffer getLogEntryBuffer()
      This function returns the LogEntryBuffer object which is used to add log entries.
      Returns:
      A LogEntryBuffer object which is used to push log entries into the file.

    • getNeutralPlayer

      public Player getNeutralPlayer()
      This function returns the pointer to neutral player
      Returns:
      The player object

    • setPhase

      public void setPhase​(int p_phase)
      This function is used to set the phase based on integer value. 0 for default, 1 for map editing, 2 for start up, 3 for issue order and 4 for execute order
      Parameters:
      p_phase - integer value of the phase

    • getPhase

      public Phase getPhase()
      This functions return object of the current phase
      Returns:
      Current phase object

    • getMapState

      public MapState getMapState()
      Get the current map state.
      Returns:
      Current map state.

    • getPlayersState

      public PlayersState getPlayersState()
      Get the current players state.
      Returns:
      Current players state.

    • loadGameEngineConsole

      public void loadGameEngineConsole()
      Used to load the GameEngine console for game play phase

    • loadGameEngine

      public void loadGameEngine()
      This function loads the Game Engine machine that starts the game and initializes the main game loop.

    • checkWinner

      public boolean checkWinner()
      This function checks if the game has end.
      Returns:
      true if game end else false

    • removeLostPlayers

      public void removeLostPlayers()
      This function is used to remove all players from the game who doesn't own a country.

    • issueCardsAndRefreshNegotiation

      public void issueCardsAndRefreshNegotiation()
      This function is used to assign cards to all player who concurred atleast one country. It also refreshes all of the players that were in negotiation.

    • executeOrderLoop

      public void executeOrderLoop()
      This function is used to loop over all the players in round-robin fashion to request execute orders

    • issueOrderLoop

      public void issueOrderLoop()
      This function is used to loop over all the players in round-robin fashion to request issue orders

    • assignReinforcements

      public void assignReinforcements()
      This function is used to assign reinforcements to the players as per the game rules

    • assignCountries

      public void assignCountries()
      This function is used to assign countries to all the players as per the rules and then start the Game Engine.

    • addRemovePlayers

      public void addRemovePlayers​(java.lang.String[] p_commandList)
      Used to add/remove players
      Parameters:
      p_commandList - The command in array form split by " "
